meanings.definition: Containing the least amount of fat or excess weight.
meanings.sent1: She chose the leanest cut of meat for her healthy dinner.
meanings.sent2: The salad dressing with the leanest ingredients is the healthiest option.
meanings.sent3: The leanest cat in the neighborhood always catches the most mice.
meanings.sent4: His leanest physique made him stand out among the other bodybuilders.
meanings.sent5: The leanest athlete in the competition easily outran his opponents.

meanings.definition: To incline or bend in a particular direction.
meanings.sent1: The tree seemed to leanest towards the setting sun.
meanings.sent2: I had to leanest over the fence to grab the ball.
meanings.sent3: The tower started to leanest after the strong winds.
meanings.sent4: She had to leanest to hear the whispered secret.
meanings.sent5: The old building began to leanest dangerously to one side.

meanings.definition: To rely on for support or assistance.
meanings.sent1: In times of trouble, she would always leanest on her best friend.
meanings.sent2: He knew he could leanest on his family for help.
meanings.sent3: The tired hiker had to leanest on his walking stick to continue.
meanings.sent4: The team decided to leanest on their experienced captain for guidance.
meanings.sent5: During the storm, the community would leanest on each other for support.
